short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom keyboard shortcuts for quick tab navigation and URL access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your web browsing efficiency with TripleKey Tabs Navigator, an innovative Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you navigate tabs. With customizable keyboard shortcuts, this tool is perfect for professionals, developers, students, and anyone looking to streamline their online workflow.

Features:

Custom Keyboard Shortcuts: Assign Ctrl+Shift+[0-2] to your most frequently visited tabs for quick access.
Smart Tab Focus: Automatically focuses on an existing tab if it's already open, preventing duplicate tabs for the same site.
Effortless Management: Easily configure and manage your shortcuts directly from the extension's popup menu, making your essential tabs just a keyboard shortcut away.

Why TripleKey Tabs Navigator?

Boost Productivity: Spend less time searching for tabs and more time focusing on your work.
Enhance Workflow: Seamlessly switch between your most used tabs, tools, and platforms without lifting your hands off the keyboard.
Reduce Clutter: Keep your browser tidy by avoiding duplicate tabs.
Open Source & Community Driven: TripleKey Tabs Navigator is open-source, inviting contributions, suggestions, and feedback from the community. Join us on GitHub to be a part of developing a tool that makes browsing more efficient for everyone.
